Who I Work With

I partner with companies and leaders who are ready to think strategically about their next phase of growth.

B2B SaaS Companies

Scaling from $1M to $50M ARR, looking to optimize their go-to-market strategy, expand into new markets, or improve competitive positioning.

Tech-Enabled Services

Professional services firms and consultancies leveraging technology to scale their business model and compete with traditional players.

Platform Businesses

Companies building two-sided markets, marketplaces, or ecosystem strategies who need help with network effects and platform dynamics.

Enterprise Software

B2B software companies selling to large enterprises, navigating complex sales cycles, and building strategic partnerships.

Client Results

Some outcomes from recent strategic consulting engagements.

$8M Series A SaaS Company

"Helped us identify and execute a new go-to-market strategy that increased our win rate by 40% and reduced our sales cycle by 3 months."

Result: 40% increase in win rate, 25% reduction in customer acquisition cost

$25M Professional Services Firm

"The strategic roadmap we developed led to our most successful year ever. We expanded into two new markets and increased margins by 15%."

Result: 2 new market expansions, 15% margin improvement

Enterprise Software Startup

"The competitive positioning strategy was a game-changer. We went from losing deals to tier-1 competitors to winning them consistently."

Result: 60% improvement in competitive win rate
